sentences.sContent: Better still, though, would be to work out what aspect of modern life causes eczema.
sentences.sContent_eng: Better still, though, would be to work out what aspect of modern life causes eczema.
sentences.sCn: 但是更好的办法是弄清楚现代生活的哪些方面会引起湿疹。

sentences.sContent: To get the most out of your eczema treatment, use it exactly as your doctor prescribes.
sentences.sContent_eng: To get the most out of your eczema treatment, use it exactly as your doctor prescribes.
sentences.sCn: 为达到湿疹治疗的最佳效果，应该照着医生开出的处方去做。

trans.tranOther: a condition in which your skin becomes dry, red, and swollen
